name: Roper
senses: blindsight 30 ft., darkvision 60 ft., passive Perception 12

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The roper makes up to four tendril attacks  then uses Reel  then attacks with its bite.

actions.name: Tendril
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +7 to hit, reach 50 ft., one target. Hit: The target is grappled (escape DC 15). Until this grapple ends  the target is restrained and the roper can't use this tendril on another target.

actions.name: Reel
actions.desc: The roper pulls each creature it is grappling up to 25 feet straight towards it.

actions.name: Bite
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 13 (2d8 + 4) piercing damage plus 9 (2d8) acid damage.

special_abilities.name: False Appearance
special_abilities.desc: While motionless, the roper is indistinguishable from a normal stalactite or stalagmite.

special_abilities.name: Spider Climb
special_abilities.desc: The roper can climb even on difficult surfaces and upside down on ceilings.

special_abilities.name: Tendrils
special_abilities.desc: The roper has eight tendrils. Each tendril has AC 20, 15 hit points, vulnerability to slashing damage, and immunity to psychic damage. A creature can also break a tendril by taking an action to make a DC 15 Strength check. A tendril takes no damage from sources other than attacks. The roper grows back any destroyed tendrils after a long rest.
